EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Operationalizing Data Analytics with Pivotal and Forrester
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Enterprises with Hadoop deployments still have yet to fully realize the business benefits of the platform. In this webinar, Pivotal and Forrester will explore:
- What is needed to transform initial investments into results, and how the right tools and solutions can help address and overcome challenges. - Shifts in the industry with regards to SQL and NoSQL systems and their implications to enterprises investing in Big Data analytics. - The emergence of in-memory data management systems for data analytics and transactional processing, in-memory operational databases, and what the future holds for these systems.
Join us <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-forrester-operationalizing-data-analytics-webinar> on January 14 for Forrester’s market perspective, Pivotal’s portfolio perspective, and apply both to drive strategy in 2015 and beyond.
